Title: Election Night: Part II
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Aaron Sorkin, Corinne Kingsbury (story), Brendan Fehily (story), Ian Reichbach (executive story editor), Camilla Blackett (staff writer), Michael Gunn (story), Dana Ledoux Miller (story), Adam R. Perlman (staff writer), Elizabeth Peterson (staff writer), Matthew Lopez (staff writer)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: As coverage of Election Night 2012 continues, the staff has to decide on which breaking story to pursue. Leona decides to let Reese decide. Mac and Will's situation heads closer to the edge. And Sloan finds her anonymous bidder.
